## Ingredients

1 cup unsalted butter

1/2 cup brown sugar

1/2 cup white sugar

2 eggs

3 cups a.p. flour

1 tsp vanilla essence

1 tsp salt

1 tsp baking soda

1 + 1/2 cups chocolate chips

## Directions

Mix melted butter, sugars, vanilla and eggs in a large bowl.

In a separate bowl, combine the flour, salt and baking soda.

Add the dry ingredients to the wet; combine to form a dough.

Stir in the chocolate chips.

Scoop about 1.5 tbsp of the dough and arrange on baking tray 2 inches apart.

Bake 9-11 mins in a 180Â°C preheated oven.
